20101224220053.000|20101224220055.000|CC1|INK, AND OTHERS ARE SIGNED IN

20101224220153.000|20101224220154.000|CC1|>>> ONLY THE OMINOUS            
20101224220154.000|20101224220155.000|CC1|THUNDERHEADS THAT BLANKET THE   
20101224220155.000|20101224220155.000|CC1|EASTERN COLORADO PLAINS BREAK UP
20101224220155.000|20101224220159.000|CC1|THE STARK, COLORLESS CONFINES OF
20101224220159.000|20101224220202.000|CC1|THE LIMON CORRECTIONAL FACILITY.
20101224220202.000|20101224220204.000|CC1|A PLACE WHERE THE COMFORTS OF   
20101224220204.000|20101224220206.000|CC1|HOME ARE A THING OF THE PAST.   
20101224220206.000|20101224220209.000|CC1|CELLS ARE CRAMPED.              
20101224220209.000|20101224220211.000|CC1|HOT SHOWERS, SHORT AND          
20101224220211.000|20101224220214.000|CC1|INFREQUENT.                     
20101224220214.000|20101224220216.000|CC1|THE FOOD IN THE CHOW HALL IS AT 
20101224220216.000|20101224220219.000|CC1|BEST BLAND.                     
20101224220219.000|20101224220221.000|CC1|IF GOOD BEHAVIOR WARRANTS,      
20101224220221.000|20101224220222.000|CC1|INMATES MAY PURCHASE A          
20101224220222.000|20101224220223.000|CC1|TELEVISION FOR THEMSELVES OR    
20101224220223.000|20101224220225.000|CC1|WORK AT JOBS THAT PAY AS LITTLE 
20101224220225.000|20101224220226.000|CC1|AS 60 CENTS PER DAY.            
20101224220226.000|20101224220229.000|CC1|BUT SOME INMATES FIND MORE      
20101224220229.000|20101224220232.000|CC1|CREATIVE WAYS TO RAISE THEIR    
20101224220232.000|20101224220234.000|CC1|STANDARD OF LIVING.             
20101224220234.000|20101224220236.000|CC1|THEY HUSTLE.                    
20101224220236.000|20101224220238.000|CC1|>> I JUST GOT THESE THIS PAST   
20101224220238.000|20101224220238.000|CC1|WEEK.                           
20101224220238.000|20101224220239.000|CC1|THESE SAUSAGES, MAN.

20101224220241.000|20101224220243.000|CC1|OF THE HUSTLE.                  
20101224220243.000|20101224220244.000|CC1|>> THIS IS STUFF THAT I WANT.   
20101224220244.000|20101224220249.000|CC1|[ BLEEP ] STUFF THAT I WANT IS  
20101224220249.000|20101224220250.000|CC1|DIFFERENT FROM ANY [ BLEEP ]    
20101224220250.000|20101224220256.000|CC1|THAT I NEED.

20101224220257.000|20101224220258.000|CC1|PEOPLE SEND ME, I USE THAT ON   
20101224220258.000|20101224220258.000|CC1|STUFF I NEED AND PHONE CALLS.   
20101224220258.000|20101224220300.000|CC1|THE STUFF THAT I WANT I HUSTLE. 
20101224220300.000|20101224220304.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, AND THAT'S WHERE THESE
20101224220304.000|20101224220304.000|CC1|COME IN.                        
20101224220304.000|20101224220309.000|CC1|TOKENS.                         
20101224220309.000|20101224220310.000|CC1|>> TOKENS ARE PURCHASED FROM THE
20101224220310.000|20101224220311.000|CC1|CANTEEN, A PLACE WHERE INMATES  
20101224220311.000|20101224220313.000|CC1|CAN BUY SNACKS AND TOILETRIES   
20101224220313.000|20101224220314.000|CC1|WITH MONEY THEY EARN FROM THEIR 
20101224220314.000|20101224220317.000|CC1|JOBS OR THAT FAMILY AND FRIENDS 
20101224220317.000|20101224220318.000|CC1|DEPOSIT INTO PERSONAL DEBIT     
20101224220318.000|20101224220319.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS MANAGED BY THE PRISON. 
20101224220319.000|20101224220323.000|CC1|>> EVERY THURSDAY WHENEVER THEY 
20101224220323.000|20101224220325.000|CC1|GET CANTEEN, THEY CAN GET UP TO 
20101224220325.000|20101224220326.000|CC1|40 AT THE TIME.                 
20101224220326.000|20101224220328.000|CC1|LEGALLY, THE ONLY THINGS THAT WE
20101224220328.000|20101224220329.000|CC1|HAVE FOR THESE IS THE SODA      
20101224220329.000|20101224220330.000|CC1|MACHINES AND THE ICE CREAM      
20101224220330.000|20101224220332.000|CC1|MACHINES.                       
20101224220332.000|20101224220334.000|CC1|THEY'RE WORTH 45 CENTS.         
20101224220334.000|20101224220336.000|CC1|SOME OF THE NAME BRAND SODAS IS 
20101224220336.000|20101224220338.000|CC1|TWO TOKENS AND THE OFF-BRAND    
20101224220338.000|20101224220340.000|CC1|SODA IS 45 CENTS, ONE TOKEN.    
20101224220340.000|20101224220340.000|CC1|>> ILLEGALLY THEY PAY OFF EACH

20101224220529.000|20101224220534.000|CC1|TOKENS, STAMPS AND MONEY ORDERS.

20101224220539.000|20101224220542.000|CC1|IT'S RARELY SPOKEN ABOUT.       
20101224220542.000|20101224220544.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE WORST HUSTLE WE  
20101224220544.000|20101224220547.000|CC1|DEAL WITH AT LIMON IS EXTORTION.
20101224220547.000|20101224220549.000|CC1|THE GANGS WILL TRY TO EXTORT THE
20101224220549.000|20101224220549.000|CC1|WEAKER OFFENDERS OR SEX         
20101224220549.000|20101224220552.000|CC1|OFFENDERS.                      
20101224220552.000|20101224220553.000|CC1|IF THEY CAN'T PAY OFF WHAT      
20101224220553.000|20101224220554.000|CC1|THEY'RE BEING EXTORTED FOR, THEY
20101224220554.000|20101224220556.000|CC1|GENERALLY GET ASSAULTED.        
20101224220556.000|20101224220558.000|CC1|SO IT HAS CAUSED PROBLEMS HERE. 
20101224220558.000|20101224220600.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE GANGS AT LIMON    
20101224220600.000|20101224220600.000|CC1|KNOWN FOR THIS KIND OF EXTORTION
20101224220600.000|20101224220603.000|CC1|IS 211.                         
20101224220603.000|20101224220604.000|CC1|>> 211 IS ONE OF OUR NOTORIOUS  
20101224220604.000|20101224220605.000|CC1|WHITE GANGS.                    
20101224220605.000|20101224220607.000|CC1|>> IT'S HOMEGROWN.              
20101224220607.000|20101224220609.000|CC1|IT'S A COLORADO GANG.           
20101224220609.000|20101224220610.000|CC1|211 STANDS FOR A ROBBERY CODE   
20101224220610.000|20101224220612.000|CC1|OUT OF CALIFORNIA.              
20101224220612.000|20101224220613.000|CC1|I DON'T KNOW WHY THEY PICKED    
20101224220613.000|20101224220615.000|CC1|THAT UP, BUT THEY DID.          
20101224220615.000|20101224220617.000|CC1|THEIR M.O. IS THEY GO AFTER SEX 
20101224220617.000|20101224220620.000|CC1|OFFENDERS.                      
20101224220620.000|20101224220622.000|CC1|>> ONLY A HANDFUL OF MY FRIENDS 
20101224220622.000|20101224220624.000|CC1|KNEW WHAT MY CHARGE WAS.        
20101224220624.000|20101224220631.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY, YOU KEEP IT QUIET.   
20101224220631.000|20101224220638.000|CC1|>> DAVID LAUDONE CLAIMS HIS     
20101224220638.000|20101224220639.000|CC1|STATUS AS A SEX OFFENDER HAS    
20101224220639.000|20101224220642.000|CC1|MADE HIM A TARGET OF THE 211    
20101224220642.000|20101224220644.000|CC1|GANG.                           
20101224220644.000|20101224220646.000|CC1|AND TO MAKE MATTERS WORSE, WHILE
20101224220646.000|20101224220647.000|CC1|MANY PRISONS SEGREGATE SEX      
20101224220647.000|20101224220648.000|CC1|OFFENDERS FOR THEIR OWN         
20101224220648.000|20101224220649.000|CC1|PROTECTION, COLORADO POLICY IS  
20101224220649.000|20101224220650.000|CC1|TO INTEGRATE THEM INTO GENERAL  
20101224220650.000|20101224220653.000|CC1|POPULATION.                     
20101224220653.000|20101224220654.000|CC1|>> WHEN THESE GANG MEMBERS MOVED
20101224220654.000|20101224220655.000|CC1|INTO THE POD, I RESPECTED       
20101224220655.000|20101224220657.000|CC1|THEIRS.                         
20101224220657.000|20101224220658.000|CC1|THEY PICK ON THE WEAK.          
20101224220658.000|20101224220659.000|CC1|I'M NOT A STRONG GUY.           
20101224220659.000|20101224220703.000|CC1|A LITTLE UP THERE IN THE AGE.   
20101224220703.000|20101224220704.000|CC1|SO THEY IMMEDIATELY THOUGHT, YOU
20101224220704.000|20101224220707.000|CC1|KNOW, LET'S SEE WHAT THIS GUY IS
20101224220707.000|20101224220709.000|CC1|IN FOR.                         
20101224220709.000|20101224220710.000|CC1|SO THEY ASKED ME FOR MY         
20101224220710.000|20101224220710.000|CC1|PAPERWORK.                      
20101224220710.000|20101224220711.000|CC1|I SAID, WELL I'M NOT GOING TO   
20101224220711.000|20101224220715.000|CC1|SHOW YOU MY PAPERWORK.          
20101224220715.000|20101224220717.000|CC1|THEN I HAD GONE TO TOMMY, WHO I 
20101224220717.000|20101224220718.000|CC1|KNEW WAS THE HEAD GUY.          
20101224220718.000|20101224220718.000|CC1|>> TOMMY IS TOMMY HOLLOMAN WHO  
20101224220718.000|20101224220719.000|CC1|PRISON OFFICIALS SAY IS THE     
20101224220719.000|20101224220720.000|CC1|LEADER OF THE 211 GANG.         
20101224220720.000|20101224220722.000|CC1|>> I TOLD HIM.                  
20101224220722.000|20101224220724.000|CC1|I SAYS, LOOK, I'M NOT GOING TO  
20101224220724.000|20101224220726.000|CC1|LIE TO YOU.

20101224220727.000|20101224220729.000|CC1|I SAID IT WAS ON AN             
20101224220729.000|20101224220731.000|CC1|EX-GIRLFRIEND OF MINE.          
20101224220731.000|20101224220734.000|CC1|I SAYS, IT WASN'T ON A CHILD.   
20101224220734.000|20101224220736.000|CC1|I SAID, I'M NOT A PIECE OF CRAP,
20101224220736.000|20101224220738.000|CC1|I'M NOT A RAT.                  
20101224220738.000|20101224220739.000|CC1|HE SAYS, YOU KNOW, YEAH, OKAY.  
20101224220739.000|20101224220741.000|CC1|THEN HE SENT DOWN ONE OF HIS    
20101224220741.000|20101224220742.000|CC1|BUDDIES AND SAYS TOMMY SAYS     
20101224220742.000|20101224220743.000|CC1|YOU'RE ALL RIGHT.

20101224220744.000|20101224220745.000|CC1|US?                             
20101224220745.000|20101224220747.000|CC1|>> IF THEY KNOW THAT YOU'RE A   
20101224220747.000|20101224220749.000|CC1|SEX OFFENDER OR SOMETHING ELSE  
20101224220749.000|20101224220750.000|CC1|OF THAT NATURE, THEN THEY WILL  
20101224220750.000|20101224220752.000|CC1|CHARGE YOU RENT TO LIVE HERE.   
20101224220752.000|20101224220757.000|CC1|>> I PAY RENT BY THEM GIVING ME 
20101224220757.000|20101224220758.000|CC1|A LIST OF CANTEEN ITEMS THAT    
20101224220758.000|20101224220759.000|CC1|THEY WANTED ME TO ORDER FOR     
20101224220759.000|20101224220800.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20101224220800.000|20101224220805.000|CC1|IT WAS $25 A MONTH.             
20101224220805.000|20101224220807.000|CC1|>> BUT IT DIDN'T STOP THERE.    
20101224220807.000|20101224220810.000|CC1|ON THE DAY BEFORE THE SUPER     
20101224220810.000|20101224220812.000|CC1|BOWL, LAUDONE SAYS HE SENT AN   
20101224220812.000|20101224220814.000|CC1|UNDERLING, INMATE JASON WRIGHT  
20101224220814.000|20101224220814.000|CC1|TO HIS CELL WITH ANOTHER ORDER, 
20101224220814.000|20101224220815.000|CC1|TO HIDE A BATCH OF HOOCH,       
20101224220815.000|20101224220817.000|CC1|INMATE-MADE ALCOHOL.            
20101224220817.000|20101224220818.000|CC1|>> SO I PANICKED WHEN I HAD TO  
20101224220818.000|20101224220820.000|CC1|DO SOMETHING ILLEGAL.           
20101224220820.000|20101224220822.000|CC1|EVEN THOUGH I WAS TOLD AND      
20101224220822.000|20101224220823.000|CC1|FORCED TO DO IT.                
20101224220823.000|20101224220826.000|CC1|I SAID NO.                      
20101224220826.000|20101224220827.000|CC1|I'M TRYING TO MAKE A STAND.     
20101224220827.000|20101224220829.000|CC1|SAYING, YOU KNOW, THIS IS IT.   
20101224220829.000|20101224220830.000|CC1|THEY CAME BACK DOWN AND SAYS YOU
20101224220830.000|20101224220830.000|CC1|GOT TO DO THIS.                 
20101224220830.000|20101224220831.000|CC1|IT'S NOT AN OPTION.

20101224223019.000|20101224223019.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101224223019.000|20101224223022.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101224223022.000|20101224223024.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,

20101224223024.000|20101224223026.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101224223026.000|20101224223028.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101224223028.000|20101224223028.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101224223028.000|20101224223031.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101224223031.000|20101224223031.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101224223031.000|20101224223033.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101224223033.000|20101224223033.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101224223033.000|20101224223035.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101224223035.000|20101224223035.000|CC1|        working together        
20101224223035.000|20101224223037.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101224223037.000|20101224223037.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101224223037.000|20101224223041.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101224223041.000|20101224223041.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101224223041.000|20101224223043.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101224223043.000|20101224223045.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101224223045.000|20101224223045.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101224223045.000|20101224223047.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101224223047.000|20101224223047.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase
